product.name: Bulbasaur
product.desc: For some time after its birth, it uses the nutrients that are packed into the seed on its back in order to grow.

product.name: Ivysaur
product.desc: The more sunlight Ivysaur bathes in, the more strength wells up within it, allowing the bud on its back to grow larger.

product.name: Venusaur
product.desc: While it basks in the sun, it can convert the light into energy. As a result, it is more powerful in the summertime.

product.name: Charmander
product.desc: The flame on its tail shows the strength of its life-force. If Charmander is weak, the flame also burns weakly.

product.name: Charmeleon
product.desc: When it swings its burning tail, the temperature around it rises higher and higher, tormenting its opponents.

product.name: Charizard
product.desc: If Charizard becomes truly angered, the flame at the tip of its tail burns in a light blue shade.

product.name: Squirtle
product.desc: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It sprays a potent foam from its mouth.

product.name: Wartortle
product.desc: Wartortle's long, furry tail is a symbol of longevity, so this Pokémon is quite popular among older people.

product.name: Blastoise
product.desc: It deliberately increases its body weight so it can withstand the recoil of the water jets it fires.
